Unfold

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • Unfold.Creature

  • public class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the functionality and data for interactive creatures within the simulation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Creature(int x, int y, int id, int rows, int columns)
      Constructor for the class, fills local variables with randomized and received data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Creature

        public Creature(int x,
                int y,
                int id,
                int rows,
                int columns)
        Constructor for the class, fills local variables with randomized and received data.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of creature location on the square grid.
        y - y-coordinate of creature location on the square grid.
        id - unique of this creature instance
        rows - amount of rows in the simulation area.
        columns - amount of columns in the simulation area.

    • Method Detail

      • runCreature

        public Creature runCreature(Square[][] originalSquares,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Creature> originalCreatures,
                            int columns,
                            int rows,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        Creature action start. Starts creatures AI simulation. Receives relevant data of other creatures and its location within the simulation.
        Parameters:
        originalSquares - the square table as it is before the activation of this creature.
        originalCreatures - the creatures ArrayList as it is before the activation of this creature.
        columns - amount of colums in the simulation area.
        rows - amount of rows in the simulation area.
        x - x-coordinate of creature location on the square grid.
        y - y-coordinate of creature location on the square grid.
        Returns:
        returns itself.
